defines



AME_DEBUG

#define AME_DEBUG
type: C preprocessor definition
description: enabled in debug config

#define AME_PLATFORM_WINDOWS
type: C preprocessor definition

#define NOMINMAX
type: C preprocessor definition

#define C_PATH_SEPARATOR "\\"

INTERNAL_STRINGIFY

#define INTERNAL_STRINGIFY(x) #x
type: C preprocessor definition

INTERNAL_CONCAT2

#define INTERNAL_CONCAT2(s1, s2) s1##s2
type: C preprocessor definition

INTERNAL_CONCAT3

#define INTERNAL_CONCAT3(s1, s2, s3) s1##s2##s3
type: C preprocessor definition

STRINGIFY

#define STRINGIFY(x) INTERNAL_STRINGIFY(x)
type: C preprocessor definition
description: stringify expression

CONCAT2

#define CONCAT2(s1, s2) INTERNAL_CONCAT2(s1, s2)
type: C preprocessor definition
description: concat 2 expressions

CONCAT3

#define CONCAT3(s1, s2, s3) INTERNAL_CONCAT3(s1, s2, s3)
type: C preprocessor definition
description: concat 3 expressions

AME_PRINT

#define AME_PRINT(message) printf_s("%s\n", message)
type: C preprocessor definition
description: print message on windows

AME_PRINTF

#define AME_PRINTF(format, ...)  printf_s(format, __VA_ARGS__); printf_s("\n")
type: C preprocessor definition
description: print formatted message on windows

AME_PRINT

#define AME_PRINT(message) __android_log_write(ANDROID_LOG_INFO, "ame", message)
type: C preprocessor definition
description: print message on android

AME_PRINTF

#define AME_PRINTF(format, ...) __android_log_print(ANDROID_LOG_INFO, "ame", format, __VA_ARGS__)
type: C preprocessor definition
description: print formatted message on android

INTERNAL_AME_CRITICAL

#define INTERNAL_AME_CRITICAL(condition) if (IsDebuggerPresent()) { __debugbreak(); } else { AME_PRINTF("critical error in %s ( line %d ) : %s", __FILE__, __LINE__, #condition); exit(EXIT_FAILURE); }
type: C preprocessor definition

INTERNAL_AME_CRITICAL

#define INTERNAL_AME_CRITICAL(condition) exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
type: C preprocessor definition

INTERNAL_AME_CRITICAL

#define INTERNAL_AME_CRITICAL(condition) __android_log_assert(#condition, "ame::critical", #condition);
type: C preprocessor definition

AME_CRITICAL

#define AME_CRITICAL(condition) if ((condition) == false){ INTERNAL_AME_CRITICAL(condition) }
type: C preprocessor definition
description: critical test macro, if unsuccessful will exit program with failure code

INTERNAL_AME_ASSERT

#define INTERNAL_AME_ASSERT(condition) if (IsDebuggerPresent()) { __debugbreak(); } else { AME_PRINTF("assert detected in %s ( line %d ) : %s", __FILE__, __LINE__, #condition); exit(EXIT_FAILURE); }
type: C preprocessor definition

INTERNAL_AME_ASSERT

#define INTERNAL_AME_ASSERT(condition) __android_log_assert(#condition, "ame::assertion", #condition)
type: C preprocessor definition

AME_ASSERT

#define AME_ASSERT(condition) if ((condition) == false){ INTERNAL_AME_ASSERT(condition) }
type: C preprocessor definition
description: assertion macro, only active in Debug

AME_ASSERT_FALSE

#define AME_ASSERT_FALSE() INTERNAL_AME_ASSERT(none)
type: C preprocessor definition

AME_ASSERT

#define AME_ASSERT(condition)
type: C preprocessor definition

AME_ASSERT_FALSE

#define AME_ASSERT_FALSE()
type: C preprocessor definition

__FILENAME__

#define __FILENAME__ (__FILE__ + SOURCE_PATH_SIZE)
type: C preprocessor definition
description: short version of __FILE__ macro

AME_BASE_TYPES

#define AME_BASE_TYPES
type: C preprocessor definition
